name: places/ChIJH8Pll4pZwokRUyQh1WPYego
formattedAddress: 310 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 310 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Design-focused property famed for its artistic public spaces, upscale rooms & hip bar scene.

originalText.text: Really beautiful place, has a tropical feel to it. The service was good but did decline towards the end when it started getting a bit more busier. The food was delicious, minus the shrimp pasta it was a bit on the bland side. But everything else was so great. The menu is very minimal, which was perfect for us because we got to basically try almost everything in the menu. The drinks really were the highlight! The drinks were refreshing and just right for a nice summer day. Would definitely be back again.

originalText.text:
Overall rating: 4.65

Initially this place was a bit hard to find. I got it kind of confused with Soho diner. I was kind of expecting the worst experience ever based on the terrible reviews, but I liked it! If you‚Äôve read any of my other reviews, you know by now I love anything with plants. And this, was a rainforest üòçüòç

My friends were running late and the service was very friendly and patient while I waited for them. I didn‚Äôt drink but the juice was very good. My friend had the salad and I had the granola which were both great.

Things got a little rocky soon after when a 3rd friend came. The service dropped significantly. They took forever to get her order, bring out food & close the check. Like 20+ minutes of waiting. We‚Äôve even tried to wave multiple people down a few times, but they were so busy and so crowded. I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs an excuse when it‚Äôs a $$$ place in Tribeca though.

As much as I love the space and the environment, it‚Äôs more of a one-time visit for me. As 3 people, I can‚Äôt imagine how it is with a party of 4 or more. It has to be better other times? Maybe a happy hour after work? Definitely not brunch for me.

I recommend coming at a different time, unless you enjoy or wouldn‚Äôt mind waiting.

originalText.text:
This place was so beautiful and we were so excited to try it. The front receptionist was clearly in a bad mood but was not excited to see customers. Kinda dampened the vibe but we looked past it.

Demetrius was the most helpful. Food was okay, vibes and service were excellent. I would go back. Thanks for having us!

text.text:

Demetrius was the most helpful. Food was okay, vibes and service were excellent. I would go back. Thanks for having us!

originalText.text:
WATERMELON MARGARITA is a must try when you come here!!! They have really good skirt steak with chimichuri. Bartenders and waiter are very friendly. Overall, recommend this place for a date, family/friends dinner. Would go back to try more on the menu!

Note: They are open all summer and closed during the cold season.

originalText.text: The patio is really beautiful, lots of interesting plants. We just stopped in for a drink and were told we could sit at the bar or high tops (even though it wasn‚Äôt busy at all). They had a lot of staff working who were just walking around. We waited for almost 20 minutes only to be told that we had to order at the bar and then go back to our table. Not a great experience, and probably wont be back.
